title: Code Standards Policy (Aggregated)
description: Aggregates all code quality, layout, naming, and capability standards. This meta-policy references modular sub-policies organized by domain.
notes: This meta-policy maintains backward compatibility with the monolithic code_standards.json
Each sub-policy is independently versioned and can be updated without affecting others
IntentRepository should support loading aggregated policies via the 'aggregates' field

rules.statement: This meta-policy aggregates sub-policies listed in the 'aggregates' field.
